[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/node-checker/src/checker/minimum_peers.rs] [Macro: get_provider!] [Required Field Bypass] Does setting self.config.common.required to false allow the checker to skip validation entirely when the provider is unavailable, hiding connectivity issues? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/node-checker/src/checker/minimum_peers.rs] [Integration: Scrape] [Duplicate Metric Handling] If the Scrape contains duplicate 'aptos_connections' metrics with the same labels, does get_metric_value() return the first, last, or aggregate? (High)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/node-checker/src/checker/minimum_peers.rs] [Trait: Checker] [build_result() Type Safety] Does the Self::build_result() helper properly capture the checker type name, or can type erasure cause incorrect checker identification in results? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/node-checker/src/checker/minimum_peers.rs] [Function: build_evaluation()] [Result Mutability] Are the CheckResults returned by build_evaluation() immutable, or can they be modified by downstream consumers to manipulate scores? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/ecosystem/node-checker/src/checker/minimum_peers.rs] [Function: check()] [Vec Allocation] Can repeated calls to check() cause memory fragmentation due to allocating new Vec<CheckResult> on each call? (Low)
